Literature.Title: A short D-enantiomeric antimicrobial peptide with potent immunomodulatory and antibiofilm activity against multidrug-resistant Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Acinetobacter baumannii.
Literature.Author: Mohamed MF, Brezden A, Mohammad H, Chmielewski J, Seleem MN

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Murine macrophage cells J774A.1:EC50=>256 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:EC50=>256 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>256 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>256µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9721(MIC=>256µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC BAA-1744(MIC=>256µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=256µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 35032(MIC=>256µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 25619(MIC=>256µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=>256µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=>256µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(MIC=>256µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1605(MIC=>256µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>256µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MIC=>256µM),Acinetobacter baumannii NR-9667(MIC=>256µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 1109(MIC=>128µM)
